categoriesExplanation: The metadata strongly indicates this is a HIIT workout, evident from the title '20 Minute FULL BODY HIIT Workout', tags including 'hiit' and 'home workout', and the description detailing 20 different moves with 40 seconds of work followed by 20 seconds of rest.
